George Hill

George Jesse Hill Jr. ▪ Instagram: indianageorge3

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-4, 188lb (193cm, 85kg)

Born: May 4, 1986 in Indianapolis, Indiana us

College: IUPUI

High School: Broad Ripple in Indianapolis, Indiana

Draft: San Antonio Spurs, 1st round (26th pick, 26th overall), 2008 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 4, 2008

Experience: 15 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is George Hill?

George Hill is 38 years old.

Where was George Hill born?

George Hill was born in Indianapolis, Indiana.

When was George Hill born?

George Hill was born on May 4, 1986.

How tall is George Hill?

George Hill is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much does George Hill weigh?

George Hill weighs 188 lbs (85 kg).

Is George Hill in the Hall of Fame?

George Hill is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was George Hill drafted?

George Hill was drafted by San Antonio Spurs, 1st round (26th pick, 26th overall), 2008 NBA Draft.

What position does George Hill play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

What is George Hill's net worth?

George Hill has made at least $113,331,400 playing professional basketball.

How much does George Hill make?

George Hill made $20,000,000 in 2018.

How many rings does George Hill have?

George Hill has won 0 championships.

What is George Hill's Twitter account?

George Hill is on Twitter at George_Hill3.

What is George Hill's Instagram account?

George Hill is on Instagram at indianageorge3.

What schools did George Hill attend?

George Hill attended Broad Ripple in Indianapolis, Indiana and IUPUI.
